transcript:
Customer: Ji sir.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Ji sir. Kya phone kitni baar call ke dekhi ho?

Customer: Kya?

Customer: Madam ne phone kitni baar call ke dekha?

Customer: Kisko?

Customer: Anita ne phone kitni baar call ke dekha?

Customer: Achcha phone bata raha hu bata raha hu.

Customer: Ji unhone kaha khola hai khola hi nahi.

Customer: Waha nahi lekin usko maine bol diya.

Customer: Meri baat suno.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Ki main IndiaMART se wapis paisa le raha hu.

Customer: Achcha.

Customer: Reman Garam collection.

Customer: Achcha.

Customer: Haan kyuki unhone khola hi nahi hai abhi tak.

Customer: Haan maine bol diya usko.

Customer: Samajhna aap baat.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Haan samajh gaya main. Aapke paas phone aaye na to bol dena collection band karwa diya.

Customer: Achcha.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Hmm. Aapke paas phone aa jaye na ye bol dena collection band karwa diya.

Executive: Thik hai sir main bol dunga. Aapko subah maine bataya tha 9:30 baje na.

Customer: Haan. 9:30 ke baad abhi tak dekhiye 2:00 baj raha hai abhi tak nahi khola.

Customer: Haan to agar aapke paas phone aa jaye na.

Customer: Hmm. Bol dena ke collection wo paise le rahe hain wo to.

Customer: Samajh gaye na?

Customer: Hmm. Ji thik hai.

Customer: Kaam hi nahi karte to kya fayda phir batao mujhe.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Hmm. Abhi us din se mera dimag kharab ho rakha aapne bataya na us din mere ko.

Customer: Haan bhai sahab.

Customer: Aapne us din bataya na mere ko.

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Haan sir bataya tha maine aapko.

Customer: Haan samajh nahi main aap aapko kuch bolu pehle to ghar ke andar khota sikra nikal jata hai bahar wale ko kya bolu.

Customer: Haan? Nahi wahi main keh raha hu dekho subah maine aapko bhi bataya. Isiliye abhi kitna 2:00 baj raha hai 2:00 bajne mein 10 minute baki hai. 9:00 se aap jod lo 3 do 5 ghante ho gaye aise to kabhi nahi milega.

Customer: Haan to isiliye to bol raha hu na.

Customer: To kal main bol diya tha main paisa wapis le raha hu.

Customer: Ye ye thodi bol raha hu package maine chalu rakha hai.

Executive: Wahi cheez hai ab batao isme ab wo ab aap aap pareshan hote hai ab mere se bolte ho ab main wahi kehta hu dekho mera sir main wahi keh sakta hu sir catalog mein sara kaam karna koi cheez chhute na sab badhiya listing apni top mein rahe.

Executive: Wo sara main kehta hu aur aakhri mein wo madam yahi bolti hai sir man lijiye lead nahi aati to unko maine bola ki dekho aisa to nahi.

Customer: Aji samjhe nahi. Jo aap baat bologe koi jhoot to nahi bologe bhai sahab. Haan nahi main to aapko photo isliye us din maine usme ek jaise hi application abhi aap application main line pe hu na aapke sath aap IndiaMART se application kholiye kholiye main bata dunga aapne khola ki nahi khola ab mujhe kaise pata hai dekho abhi nahi khola aap abhi kholo main aapko bata dunga khola to yaha dikh jata hai ki kis time pe kya khola kab kab ha kab by lead consume kari main bata nahi deta hu aapko sir ye wali by lead use hui thi kal kya baat hui ispe to mujhe dikhta hai yaha pe kal konsi by lead consume hui ab sochiye ab dekho main batata hu subah maine aapko bataya tha do by lead chali gayi thi na.

Customer: Haan sahi hai. Ab dekhiye ab main aapko bata raha hu abhi is beech mein bhi koi by lead gayi hogi to main batata hu aapko rukna. Haan.

Executive: Itna to jo malik rehte hain company ke khud ho na isse jyada to wo log use kar lete hain sir.

Customer: Haan sahi baat hai kya fayda phir.

Executive: Ye dekho ye lo abhi do ghante pehle marble temple construction service ek aur by lead Mumbai se gayi hai.

Customer: Haan. Do ghante pehle yaani ki 2:00 baje 12:00 baje 12:00 baje.

Customer: Is mahine mein usne kharidi hai char panch.

Customer: Samajh gaye na aap?

Executive: Maine unko bataya hai ki madam aapka product aisa hai bahut competition hai bahut aapko active rehna padega yaha pe log lage rehte hain aake grahak ispe to aapko laga rehna padega maine isiliye to aapka ye hai maine baki cheeze to aapko dikhni nahi hai baki sabhi dekhte hain to aap panch panch ghante agar madam dekhenge nahi to wo koi bhi matlab wo kitni bhi achi lead hogi ispe kitna bhi koi dhyan na de to wo kabhi nahi mil payegi.

Customer: Thik hai main ek do din mein dusre adjust karta hu main ek do din mein.

Executive: Thik hai sir. Thik hai na aap usko bol dena paisa le rahe hain wo to wapis.

Executive: Thik hai mere paas aayega main bol dunga. Haan ye mat bolna ke wo thik hai main aapko ye bol dunga aapne jaisa bola hai main haan aisa hi bol dunga. Haan ki paise release kar rahe hain unko wapis. Thik hai na kaam kaam rakhne ke abhi aapko company kis baat ki tankha de rahi hai.

Customer: Hmm. Haan bhai sahab?

Executive: Sahi baat hai. Kis baat ki salary de rahi hai kaam ke liye de rahi hai na. Haan ye sab cheeze to main ye sab cheeze to main pehle check nahi karta tha jab aapne bola tab maine check karna chalu kiya to main dekhta tha ghante ghante do do ghante tak usme login hi nahi ho raha hai to kaise hoga main to samajhta tha maine us din main galti mana na aapki maine galti mana na uski. Hmm hmm. Haan? To ek din to maine unko do lead ka photo khich ke bheja tha mam ye dekho pada hua hai aapne uthaya nahi. Haan pehle to main are karta hu ek do din mein. Thik hai sir. Ek do din mein koi pakke to nahi chale jayenge do chale jayega ek do din mein thik hai na sir. Thik hai sir thik hai. Thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for IndiaMART subscription.

- Expresses frustration about not getting buyleads.

- Claims the company is not working properly.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to inform about refund request.

- Executive explained how to check buylead consumption.

- Executive mentioned about marble temple construction service lead.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform the customer about refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, application
